website_summaries.verdict: Deluxe hunting slingshot that blends power and accuracy.
pros: Handle has grooves so hand is comfortable when you shoot
Features 3-hole rubber band design for plenty of power with each shot
Magnet on support strap for portable ammo loading
cons: Limited range compared to similar slingshots

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted, & Exactly as advertized!
customer_reviews.text: This product came exactly as advertised! Had two sets of bands with leather, and the flashlight attachments. Had Allen wrenches for every screw on the slingshot. The arm brace moves stiff so it doesn't flop around, but the leather arm brace kinda small for a bigger guy, but once you squeeze it together to fit your arm its still not bad at all. I thought it would be heavier for some reason, but overall I am very impressed with this kit, which also came with ammo, so your ready to go. From my experience so far all I could Say is I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Slussman

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible, the photo makes them look odd but in person they're truly awesome. Purchased them as groomsman gifts and the guys loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: High powered fun shooting slingshot.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful slingshot fun no matter what your age is Iwould not recommend for younger children but it’s so powerful they might not be able to pull it back far enough to do much damage anyways but I still would have used with adult supervision. Would recommend to a friend and would buy from again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: George R

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement Bands
customer_reviews.text: Have more stretch than the bands that came with my slingshot. I have very long arms, so this allows me to pull back far enough that I can achieve a good cheek weld. Slung plenty of rounds through the first band, hasn't broken yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality craftsmanship, ammo was already rusted in the package.
customer_reviews.text: Not a real marksman’s slingshot. Short bands wit poor quality material. They won’t last long. The ammunition that came with the item was already rusted. A good summer toy for a country kid as long as all of the rules of using a firearm have been taught.
customer_reviews.author: Jehu H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it's made very well
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it's made very well. Kinda hard to pull coz the bands are hard. Guess I have to build muscles.
customer_reviews.author: A. Arceo

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for one of my children! It is so cool. Since then everybody in the family wants one! We have purchased one for my dad and for our oldest son! Its high quality and works great. We are going to be buying another one very soon
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: medium triple bands
customer_reviews.text: Theese are just right as a medium pull strength band sets. The length is perfect for me to draw to my eye and fire. The pouch is good it seems and is on the light side of pouch weight. The leather is of good quality with 3 holes to reduce weight. I believe i will get a long life out of theese bands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be great quality but both straps snapped at the first try so I'm very disappointed. Everything else looks good but the straps were rotten or just really bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Diaz

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but still good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I got a slingshot with a small pouch. Turns out, it’s a but small for my fingers to handle easily, meaning I won’t be able to reload as quickly as I would want to. Still good for shooting practice.
customer_reviews.author: Allan R.

customer_reviews.title: Try a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT come as advertised. The slingshot was bought as a gift and did not come with bands at all. Then I bought the “replacement “ bands which was supposed to come with more shot but didn’t. I would try a different company if I were to do this again.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice Slingshot
customer_reviews.text: My son says this Slingshot is working really good. Hasn't used the +1 bands yet but he likes installed green rubber bands. Really throws the provided steel balls out there.
customer_reviews.author: William Struse

customer_reviews.title: Strength required
customer_reviews.text: You have to be a gorilla to pull back to the cheek position. I eliminated one band and it works well with good power.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbob

customer_reviews.title: Bungees are junk
customer_reviews.text: Works great when it works. Two of the bungees broke after a few shots. Luckily it came with a spare. But one of the bungees broke after a few shots on that one as well. Don't waste your money on this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: A buyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble to the point that this blind man had no problems. Comes with the tools and only required some tightening when I opened the package. Quality product and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Modrak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it lots of fun. easy to place shots, lots of power and good build.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but not for the weak. It came ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but not for the weak. It came in a timely manner and was packaged in a professional manner. The storage box is extremely helpful!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Best sling shot ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wow awesome adult slingshot. Very nice and powerful. It punched through an aluminum can both sides with 3/8 steel slingshot ammo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to honestly impress my buddies who frequently shoot slingshots. Yeah this showed theres up quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good and the power is surprising
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good and the power is surprising,the pouch is just the right size for the 3/8" diameter shot I prefer to use! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Little steel balls are still steel balls
customer_reviews.text: Great little steel balls. Wish there were more for the money but other than that, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tony K

customer_reviews.title: Tube broke within 10 shot and draw is too short.
customer_reviews.text: Tubes have short draw length and one tube broke after 10 or so shots.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Description misleading
customer_reviews.text: Claims the two rubber bands come with 50 steel ammo- but it does not
customer_reviews.author: Judie S

customer_reviews.title: All right
customer_reviews.text: Nice weapon but handle needs. To be. A better metal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing more than my child ever could. So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. The neighbor kids come over and ask to use it all the time. Even the Big ones (my 34 year old neighbor comes and plays too). Almost time to order more ammo. We have been through buckets...
customer_reviews.author: Matthew I.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged rubber
customer_reviews.text: One of the spare rubber arrived cut and "manually fixed" with a piece of paper,
customer_reviews.author: GMtz921

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product came with 2 rubber bands, one was broken but Wisdoman made it right.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Pain
customer_reviews.text: Band is to tight, it broke on the first day we got it. The strap also hurts your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: isaac

customer_reviews.title: Over-Designed..6 is Not Better
customer_reviews.text: No....Don't buy ANY slingshot with 6 rubber tubes. There are 6 opportunities for uneven acceleration causing curve balls and weird travel. Found that 3 of of the rubber tubes were slipping in their holder. Couldn't hit a thing. I removed all 6 tubes and installed 2 rubber tubes like days of old and accuracy went up 80%. I will keep this slingshot because of the excellent handle and armrest. They work well. The magnets on the armrest are very strong...hold lots of balls. BTW.....the armrest can be easily removed.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdtimer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slingshot
customer_reviews.text: Came in a great box and really enjoyed the unveiling of my new slingshot. Amazingly well made and durable. My best friends is getting as now.
customer_reviews.author: mark pope

customer_reviews.title: Cool item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old to complete his collection. ( BB guns, bow and arrow, etc) It’s very nice, but can be quite dangerous if not supervised properly.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks Great in every way.. shoots way better than I expected.. dangerous up to about Football field
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice slingshot
customer_reviews.text: This slingshot works well: I only wish the pouch was a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great slingshot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, accurate or easy to accurately shot; great quality on materials also, great price, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for hunting
customer_reviews.text: Everything i wanted and more. No more pesky squirrels around here...
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Getting biodegradable ammo is best for nature and doesn't kill animals
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the squirrels raiding my bird feeders. Worked for 3 weeks. Did not kill any animals.
customer_reviews.author: yelena

customer_reviews.title: Tactical slingshot
customer_reviews.text: Nice and powerful, a great addition to my tactical training
customer_reviews.author: Jay Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Buy the good old handle and tube
customer_reviews.text: Weak first set of tubes broke in an hour. Just weak all around. Buy the good old handle and tube.
customer_reviews.author: James Ryan Durham

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected...  not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Rather cheap price but very impressive look... came a long way since Bart Simpson’s wood sling shot
customer_reviews.author: Tony Allison

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: No advantage over the basic one band wrist rocket. One of the three bands broke about the third time I shot it. Looks cool, but I hated it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it but had to send it back got a bad one
customer_reviews.author: TD325

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gadget with Ratio Price/Quality absolutely alright
customer_reviews.text: Product and Service exactly as described. Nice Gadget with Ratio Price/Quality absolutely alright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Sling shot steel shots
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Great for my sling shot I wanted to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: Derika M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything came OK, nice box, feels heavy and durable. The rubber bands all ok. Worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: luiz fellipe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Small note: Should have added to the package the assembly instructions..
customer_reviews.author: Oren Zamski

customer_reviews.title: Great for pest control
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Ive taken out all the stray cats in my neighborhood with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Massey

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enclosed rubber bands broke after just a few shots. Otherwise a decent flip...
customer_reviews.author: russ copeland

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Magnets on arm strap are gimmicky. Ammo falls off during firing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T Langan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Box was busted and little BB's were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Hargis

customer_reviews.title: I think it was the best gift I could have given to him
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit with my grandson. I think it was the best gift I could have given to him.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Frame feels good and it does have some power
customer_reviews.text: Bands are inconsistent. First set broke after about 20 pulls, second set has much harder and shorter draw, can't pull to cheek with an extended arm. With three bands if any breaks they're done so there are 6 points of failure. Frame feels good and it does have some power, but I probably would have gone with a Scout or Torque if I buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dacotah Melicher

customer_reviews.title: You should send me another green set made correctly.
customer_reviews.text: One of the leads on the sling shot did not have a nub in it and this lead will not stay in slingshot. The green set is useless.
customer_reviews.author: James Lauder

customer_reviews.title: GET MORE AMMO
customer_reviews.text: Great slingshot comes in a nice plastic case with extra bands ones harder,to pull that the other the flashlight attatchment has a screw,that sticks out too far and when you fold the wrist thing out it bends it also u should get some different ammo as these one are the same,diameter as an aitsoft beed but all in all great for tarfet practicing.....havent hunted with it yet tho
customer_reviews.author: Wriley

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality, but pretty heavy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality, but pretty heavy. I don't think it's necessary to have all parts be solid metal. Mine had a few paint chips, so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan V.

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless steel, all alloy construction
customer_reviews.text: Product not stainless steel. All metal alloy construction including bow With Amazon Prime be assured that if any product does not meet your needs for any reason you will recieve your money back. Shop Amazon Prime with confidence. It's been a week and no money back. You got your junk back now just refund me already!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony K

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. Sling shot came with zero bands. Advertisement showed it was supposed to come with two.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Jones

customer_reviews.title: but to get the velocity you want you have to crank it back super far which broke two of the bands
customer_reviews.text: Kinda ok power, but to get the velocity you want you have to crank it back super far which broke two of the bands. Lasted about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Should be a new one
customer_reviews.text: Received a used one with no instructions and parts scattered all over with a taped box, grrr. I paid for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old absolutely loves this. It's good quality and he has been target shooting with it a lot and also learning responsibilities of having something that can hurt people.
customer_reviews.author: Startastic Time

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one is for my husband and he likes it
customer_reviews.author: werkerss

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun to be had with this wrist rocket. Spent years lighting M80’s and blowing things up. Now, I can shoot them into the air in which they light up the sky!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

product_meta.title: Wisdoman Outdoor Wrist Rocket Slingshot Kit, Adjustable Stainless Professional Hunting High Velocity Catapult Powerful Slingshots with 2 Rubber Bands and 50 Ammo Balls
feature_bullets: ATTENTION: Wisdoman We provide BETTER quality and MORE comfortable holding slingshots.
High Quality Professional Unique Human Engineering Design Slingshot.
Top anti-rust stainless-steel; High-tension rubber band; Top leather wrapper;Top firing accuracy, Durable with die-casting aluminum alloy frame.
Used for outdoor competition and fitness catapult, also for boutique collection.
50 steel balls included, 2 Rubber Band and a small flashlight combo for free.
